name: blueVelvetMusicStore
description: This project is a web application for managing products in the BlueVelvet Music Store. It includes functionalities to create, edit, list, and delete products using Node.js, TypeScript, and Express for the backend. The data is stored in a PostgreSQL database and Prisma is used as the ORM for database interactions. The application also features a graphical user interface implemented with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
author: Pedro Augusto | Jo√£o Vitor Vigarani
